const PROFILE_ICONS=[...HOBBIES_ICONS,...WEATHER_ICONS,...LOCATIONS_ICONS,...PEOPLE_ICONS];export default function UserMenu(){const{userProfile,signOutUser,DEPARTMENT_NAMES}=useAuth();const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);React.useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{if(isOpen)setIsOpen(false);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll,{passive:true});return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[isOpen]);const getInitials=name=>{if(!name)return'?';return name.split(' ').map(word=>word.charAt(0)).join('').toUpperCase().slice(0,2);};const getProfileIcon=()=>{if(userProfile!==null&&userProfile!==void 0&&userProfile.profileIcon){const icon=PROFILE_ICONS.find(icon=>icon.id===userProfile.profileIcon);return icon?icon.icon:null;}return null;};const getProfileDisplay=()=>{const icon=getProfileIcon();if(icon){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-theme-primary flex items-center justify-center text-lg text-white shadow-sm aspect-square",children:icon});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-8 h-8 rounded-full bg-theme-primary flex items-center justify-center text-sm font-bold text-white shadow-sm aspect-square",children:getInitials(userProfile===null||userProfile===void 0?void 0:userProfile.displayName)});}};const getDepartmentDisplay=()=>{if(!(userProfile!==null&&userProfile!==void 0&&userProfile.departments)||userProfile.departments.length===0){return null;}if(userProfile.departments.length===1){const departmentId=userProfile.departments[0];return DEPARTMENT_NAMES[departmentId]||departmentId;}else{return'Multiple Departments';}};if(!userProfile)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),className:"flex items-center gap-1 p-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors duration-200",children:[getProfileDisplay(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{className:"w-4 h-4 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400",fill:"none",stroke:"currentColor",viewBox:"0 0 24 24",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{strokeLinecap:"round",strokeLinejoin:"round",strokeWidth:2,d:"M19 9l-7 7-7-7"})})]}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"absolute right-0 mt-2 w-48 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-lg border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-600 py-1 z-50",onMouseLeave:()=>setIsOpen(false),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-4 py-2 border-b border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-600",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-3",children:[getProfileDisplay(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white",children:userProfile.displayName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400",children:userProfile.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-theme-primary font-medium capitalize",children:userProfile.role==='developer'?'Developer':userProfile.role}),getDepartmentDisplay()&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-500 font-medium",children:getDepartmentDisplay()})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signOutUser,className:"w-full px-4 py-2 text-left text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors duration-200",children:"Sign Out"})]})]});}

Combined icons for backward compatibility const PROFILE_ICONS = [...HOBBIES_ICONS, ...WEATHER_ICONS, ...LOCATIONS_ICONS, ...PEOPLE_ICONS]; export default function UserMenu() { const { userProfile, signOutUser, DEPARTMENT_NAMES } = useAuth(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); React.useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { if (isOpen) setIsOpen(false); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll, { passive: true }); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, [isOpen]); const getInitials = (name) => { if (!name) return '?'; return name .split(' ') .map(word => word.charAt(0)) .join('') .toUpperCase() .slice(0, 2); }; const getProfileIcon = () => { if (userProfile?.profileIcon) { const icon = PROFILE_ICONS.find(icon => icon.id === userProfile.profileIcon); return icon ? icon.icon : null; } return null; }; const getProfileDisplay = () => { const icon = getProfileIcon(); if (icon) { return (
{icon}
); } else { return (
{getInitials(userProfile?.displayName)}
); } }; const getDepartmentDisplay = () => { if (!userProfile?.departments || userProfile.departments.length === 0) { return null; } if (userProfile.departments.length === 1) { const departmentId = userProfile.departments[0]; return DEPARTMENT_NAMES[departmentId] || departmentId; } else { return 'Multiple Departments'; } }; if (!userProfile) return null; return (
{isOpen && (
setIsOpen(false)} >
{getProfileDisplay()}

{userProfile.displayName}

{userProfile.email}

{userProfile.role === 'developer' ? 'Developer' : userProfile.role}

{getDepartmentDisplay() && (

{getDepartmentDisplay()}

)}
)}
); }
